requirements: Prerequisites: BENG 249 or equivalent, MATH 120 or equivalent.
description:
This course focuses on engineering and biophysical approaches to cancer. The course examines the current state of the art understanding of cancer as a complex disease and the advanced engineering and biophysical methods developed to study and treat this disease. All treatment methods are covered. Basic quantitative and computational backgrounds are required.
Prerequisites: BENG 249 or equivalent, MATH 120 or equivalent.
title: Engineering and Biophysical Ap...
long_title: Engineering and Biophysical Approaches to Cancer
